metadata.title: Embrace the Lamplight of Ambition, Part 3

tracks.text: Sunraku's muscular body, covered in the scars of Lycagon's mark, walks across an expanse under the night sky and nearly full moon.
Debris floats
Backdropped by lightning, text reads, Shangri-La Frontier
Ink sketch of Sunraku's face. The ink splatters, and Emul falls through it. Sunraku catches her, and she crawls onto his shoulder. Behind him is a picture of Rakuro
Pencilgon smiles at us. Behind her is a picture of Towa Amane.
Katzo's hands burn with fire. Behind her is Kei Uomi.
Psyger strikes the grown with the purple long sword Antinomy.
A nest of interlocking lines forms. Ceecrue, a white rabbit samurai, leaps across them.
Outstretched hands form a diamond. Akitsu Akane's face smiles in the gap.
A woman holds a bow and a man holds a staff.
Chains wrap around Sunraku's legs
Rakuro reaches up a hand. A hand reaches towards the metal spine in the ruins of past glories.
Psyger-0, Sunraku, Katzo, and Pencilgon stand side by side.
The chains shatter.
In red, fishmen wield swords and race towards the party in a circle.
The fishmen charge a boy wearing a pirate hat at the wheel of a ship.
A mermaid fights a shark.
Giant octopus arms wrap around a tattered ship
A girl with blue eyes and white hair dances. Star Rain, Sylvia Goldberg. She falls into the floor, the floor rotates, and a white super hero replaces her. Galaxia Series, The Meteus
A brown haired girl turns into a tree girl. Nitro Squad.
In front of her stands an old man samurai and a young man with gauntlets.
A whale swims, its face engulfed with fire. It approaches an expanse with floating debris. Sunraku walks.
Lightning crackles across the whale. It opens its mouth. Darkness.
Akane runs across the ruins, Emul dangling by her pony tail. Ceecrue follows.
She smiles wide.
Psyger strikes with crimson flames.
Lycagon Prime snarls and slaps Psyger across the clearing, into rubble.
Text, 38, Embrace the Lamplight of Ambition, Part 3
Psyger struggles to sit up
He strikes rapidly
Prime stares in Psyger's direction
Prime charges at Psyger
Prime lunges, paw outstretched.
Psyger rolling dodges a swipe.
Lycagon runs after Psyger, who evades swipes.
Sunraku runs
She plants her feet
She swings and stops
She stands in a shadow in front of Lycagon. Behind her, a pool of shadow grows.
Clone bites Psyger's head
Clone chews on Psyger's bleeding body
The body flickers and turns into a wooden log.
The clone disappears. The log drops to the ground.
Emul flies through the air.
Ceecrue
Lycagon Prime stomps on the log and growls.
She charges the girls
She swipes. They dodge.
She makes hand gestures. Lycagon stomps on Psyger. A log. Akane and Psyger land nearby.
Lycagon charges them.
Akane smiles to herself. Dialog, You've received a party request from Sunraku. Accept?
She clicks yes
Party, 3 players, 2 bunnies. Psyger sweats.
Lycagon charges
Suzaku's jets blast. It flies in a circle, creating a pool of clear sky around the moon.
The samurai bunny runs at an angle
Emul rides Sunraku's shoulder.
Emul produces a grimoire. Lycagon swipes at Akane and Psyger
A glowing, golden chain shoots from Emul's grimoire and wraps around Lycagon's back right foot. Lycagon stops and looks back.
Lycagon growls and kicks, shattering the chain.
He punches rapidly.
Lycagon jumps away and pounces on Psyger
Psyger turns, takes her dark form, and strikes.
Lycagon snarls and bats Psyger away.
Shadow clone
Clone stomps. A log goes flying.
The clone dissipates. Psyger stands behind Akane
Akane reviews her item list. Lycagon charges them. They run.
Sunraku pursues
Lycagon bites a tall stone rod. It breaks off, and she throws it.
It flies towards Akane
Ceecrue wields his sword and races forward, slicing the stone into pieces.
Her grimoire glows and shoots a torrent of golden light at Lycagon.
Lycagon charges Sunraku
Dark form Psyger races behind Lycagon and strikes her on the back.
She takes her light form. Lycagon turns and looks, snraling/
He shoots a crystal
The crystal lands between Lycagon and Psyger. The wolf pauses, and a golden chain wraps around her paw.
The wolf looks up. Psyger arcs towards her, sword overhead.
Psyger slices with crimson flame, filling the clearing. Akane shields her face. The golden chains snap and Lycagon leaps into the air.
Lycagon backflips and lands.
Psyger drives her sword into the ground. A black magic circle forms.
He readies his gauntlets. Lycagon towers over him.
Clouds engulf the moon.
Pixel art title card. Blue text over a starry background spell Shangri-La Frontier
Sunraku holds blue blades and stands in an underwater town.
Pencilgon holds a golden spear and stands in the hidden garden
Katzo holds up fists and stands by the Teardrop lake
Psyger crosses her arms and stands in the Lightless Barrens
Montage of the game store, the Utopia headquarters, the palace, Rabbituza, a tower, and a sea side city.
Sunraku runs across an underwater town. Fish swim in the air. Seaweed lines the street.
Katzo runs across the cave floor on the shores of the Teardrop lake
A serpent emerges from the lake. Crab pincers snap.
Montage of items. Log. Bow. Twin blue blades. Grimoire. Mana potion. Cards.
Pencilgon runs across the hidden garden. Red spider lilies blow in the breeze, surrounded by cavernous walls, under a full moon.
Ceecrue, a woman, Sunraku, Akane, a man, and Psyger walk along a dock. A crescent moon shines over the sea.
A red ship floats at sea. A giant octopus leg reaches up.
Rakuro, Towa, Kei, and a brown haired woman walk along an urban street. Cars drive by.
Montage. An old man in a black robe. A fox mask. A person in a yellow demon mask. An old man samurai. The beetle helm. A gas mask.
Blue text over a black background spells Shangri-La Frontier
